author: heinz.gassner
title: LATAM Industry Presentation Kit
description: Growing the Cardano ecosystem and Cardano opportunities in Latin America's industry requires localized presentation- and training material
solution: We utilize the knowledge of our team for establishing a modular DLT/Blockchain presentation & training framework for industry
experience: More than 30 years of industry-leadership experience combined with direct access to relevant Latin American expertise & industry network
